Playground SDK™ 4.0

Welcome to the Playground SDK™ 4.0 for Windows.

Playground SDK™ 4.0 for Windows requires Visual Studio 2005 (Visual C++ 2005).

Documentation is in the docs folder.

A sample project is provided in the skeleton folder, so all you have to is make a new project from the provided template.

See license.txt for licensing information.

The Playground SDK™ is Copyright © PlayFirst, Inc. 2006-2007.

Visit http://developer.playfirst.com for additional details.
